title: Championship skins
body:
Hey Riot 

Are all the championship skins going to be sold in the next couple of days or just Riven and Zed?????????

replies.body:
As *Lew* mentioned, we've had more than one Championship skin in the store in the past, but I'd keep an eye on the [News Page](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) for the official announcement when it goes out.

Let me know if you have any questions.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=xTL5Aqds,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-09-22T21:38:20.836+0000)
>
> As *Lew* mentioned, we've had more than one Championship skin in the store in the past, but I'd keep an eye on the [News Page](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) for the official announcement when it goes out.
> 
> Let me know if you have any questions.

Yeah i have a Question 

Will be something like a "Championship bundle" or something like that that you can get all the skins???
or we have to buy them individually ??

Am sooo excited about these skins i cant wait 

the most excited i felt with this game so far 

let me tell you Riot 

This is THE most anticipated skin sale in the WHOLE year 

Do something special :)

I honestly don't know. We'll have to wait together and see what comes out on the store. ^.^

Let me know if you have any other questions.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=xTL5Aqds,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2016-09-25T17:35:54.746+0000)
>
> I honestly don't know. We'll have to wait together and see what comes out on the store. ^.^
> 
> Let me know if you have any other questions.

just bought the bundle lol i knew it will be a bundle
They usually bring back the whole set of Championship skins when they come back to the store.
